<<< Head. Bang. On. Desk.
- So I eat bread again because I really love it. Sometimes I think I should stop because I felt better. But I am definitely not coeliac!
- I felt fantastic for a while but I still had doubts whether I was truly a coeliac. So I had another test and it came back negative! >>
- I had this dodgy biopsy claiming I was a coeliac. So I stopped eating gluten and felt great. But I actually just stopped eating junk. >>

If you are somebody I know and would like to keep in touch you can find on IG or email. Very 2010, I know.
This is my personal choice and should not (in theory) offend anyone. It's quite interesting though what triggers an emotional response.
I feel that Twitter has changed over the last few years to the point that noise:signal ratio has become too high.
PSA: As part of my effort to focus my time and attention on things that matter I have reduced my Twitter access to 1 hour between 2-3pm.
